mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDER_BUNDLE(ORDER_BUNDLE_ID, MEMBER_ID, REG_DATE, RECEIVE_NAME, TEL, POST_NUM, ADDRESS2, ADDRESS1, USED_POINT, PAY_METHOD,FINAL_TOT_PRICE,FINAL_DISCOUNT_PRICE,FINAL_DELIVERY_COST,buyer_name,buyer_tel,COUPON_ID) VALUES (#{orderBundleId},#{memberId},SYSDATE, #{receiveName},#{tel},#{postNum},#{address2}, #{address1},#{usedPoint},#{payMethod},#{finalTotPrice}, #{finalDiscountPrice},#{finalDeliveryCost},#{buyerName},#{buyerTel},#{couponId})

SELECT SEQ_ORDER_ITEM.NEXTVAL as orderItemId FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO ORDER_ITEM(ORDER_ITEM_ID, ORDER_ID, PRODUCT_ID,PRICE, FINAL_PRICE, DISCOUNT_PERCENT) VALUES (#{orderItemId},#{orderBundleId},#{productId},#{originalPrice},#{finalPrice},#{disCountPercent})
INSERT INTO ORDER_STATUS(ORDER_STATUS_ID, ORDER_ITEM_ID, STATUS, REG_DATE) VALUES (SEQ_ORDER_STATUS.nextval,#{orderItemId},#{status},SYSDATE)
mapper.select: select order_bundle_id orderBundleId, m.member_id memberId,oi.order_item_id orderItemId,oisb.price * ((100-oi.discount_percent)/100) finalPrice, oisb.price,address1,address2,post_num postNum,oi.discount_percent discountPercent,status,oisb.quantity quantity, oisb.stock_id stockId from ORDER_BUNDLE ob join MEMBER M on ob.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID join ORDER_ITEM oi on ob.ORDER_BUNDLE_ID = oi.ORDER_ID join PRODUCT p on oi.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID join ORDER_STATUS os on oi.ORDER_ITEM_ID = os.ORDER_ITEM_ID join ORDER_ITEM_STOCK_BUNDLE oisb on oi.ORDER_ITEM_ID = oisb.ORDER_ITEM_ID where ORDER_BUNDLE_ID = #{orderBundleId} OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY

SELECT COUNT(*) AS dataCount from ORDER_BUNDLE ob join MEMBER M on ob.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID join ORDER_ITEM oi on ob.ORDER_BUNDLE_ID = oi.ORDER_ID join PRODUCT p on oi.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID join ORDER_STATUS os on oi.ORDER_ITEM_ID = os.ORDER_ITEM_ID join ORDER_ITEM_STOCK_BUNDLE oisb on oi.ORDER_ITEM_ID = oisb.ORDER_ITEM_ID where ORDER_BUNDLE_ID = #{orderBundleId}

select NVL(SUM(oisb.quantity),0) orderCount , NVL(SUM(oi.final_price),0) orderPrice from ORDER_BUNDLE ob join MEMBER M on ob.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID join ORDER_ITEM oi on ob.ORDER_BUNDLE_ID = oi.ORDER_ID join PRODUCT p on oi.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID join ORDER_STATUS os on oi.ORDER_ITEM_ID = os.ORDER_ITEM_ID join ORDER_ITEM_STOCK_BUNDLE oisb on oi.ORDER_ITEM_ID = oisb.ORDER_ITEM_ID where p.SELLER_ID = #{sellerId} AND status = 1
AND TRUNC(ob.reg_date) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)
AND TRUNC(ob.reg_date) >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 7
AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM ob.reg_date) = EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SYSDATE) AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM ob.reg_date) = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE)

select COUNT(*) count from ORDER_BUNDLE ob join ORDER_ITEM oi on ob.ORDER_BUNDLE_ID = oi.ORDER_ID left outer join ORDER_STATUS on oi.ORDER_ITEM_ID = ORDER_STATUS.ORDER_ITEM_ID where ob.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} and STATUS = #{status}
